review: Hlo everyone… I went fr dimple surgery and doctor was very friendly and gave detailed explanation abt my surgery and all things… And after surgery also continuesly  they keep on touch with me and they asked me abt hw I’m feeling and abt medicines and all things… overall I would definitely recommend to this to others….

I had taken appointment for father for dental check up and we have visited Joymitras Super Speciality Dental And Implant Clinic. Dr. Nirban was very nice with in the appointment and it was like normal check up. All the things was good only for us. For any minor dental related check up I would like to recommend this doctor only. We had a positive response from the clinic in our appointment.
Doctor was very friendly, listened to the issue and took all the precautions before treating my mother in law as well as me. I would prefer going to this doctor only.
Went for Root canal and tooth cap and doctor was very friendly and gave us a detailed explanation of  the problem. We thank him and will definitely recommend him to others as well.
Dr Mitra not only did take care of the issue but even called and followed up if I am ok. Easy to locate the clinic
Unfortunately I couldn't attend on personal grounds.. But doc was so good and generous.... Stronger recommend

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Customer friendly and got apt treatment. Immediately after consultation he stepped into issue and done the needful to my utmost satisfaction and really happy with the treatment done by him.
Everything was organised so well! Cleanup was done perfectly! Staff was so understanding. I would definitely recommend this to others
